comment._content: Explèndida colecciòn de Christy de Junio, belleza y gran artista. Muchas gracias y saludos.

comment.author: 25114104@N02
comment._content: June Christy is a lovely singer and as far as I can tell, the greatest sweetheart that has ever lived. Her and Cooper are adorable!

comment.author: 62711206@N05
comment._content: Uh Huh!, "The Misty Miss Christy", Tampico and How High The Moon, with the Stan Kenton Orchestra. Bob "Coop" Cooper, silky smooth, Lester Young inspired, tenor sax with Kenton, later, The Lighthouse Allstars and a regular at Shelly Manne's Manhole in Hollywood. Bob was every inch a gentleman and sweetheart, what a great shot of them, how young they were, a true picture of their hearts.
